Original:
台北市大安區｜monomono 隱身在東區巷弄內的美麗酒吧

Monomono 酒吧位於安和路的巷弄內，在東區至信義區這一帶的酒吧一級戰區 已經經營了二十多年，疫情期間有短暫休息一陣子，於2022年10月重新開始經營，二十多年來 培養出許多對這裡很有感情的老客人，在Google評論獲得4. 7顆星的好評。

Monomono主要提供各式調酒，以及台式在地口味和異國美食等料理，今天點了蘑菇蝦球和薯條，兩道菜都相當好吃，蝦球彈脆鮮甜 風味十足，薯條外表超級酥脆 內裡還吃得到薯泥的香甜綿密，料理讓人印象深刻！！💗💗💗

酒只點了最淡的，無法判斷調酒師功力😆

酒吧營業至凌晨三點，越晚人越多。
晚上十點多過來跟朋友聊聊天，氣氛放鬆，皮革沙發和原木桌椅吧檯很有質感，坐起來也很舒適，蠻喜歡的店。

#台北美食 #台北打卡景點 #台北網美餐廳 #台北特色餐廳 #大安區餐酒館 #大安區酒吧 #大安區歐陸料理 #創意料理 #台北特色餐廳 #台北特色酒吧 #台北米其林 #東區餐酒館 #東區特色酒吧 #東區打卡景點 #東區打卡餐廳 #東區網美景點
EN:
Da'an District, Taipei City ｜ Monomono's hidden beautiful bars in the alley in the East District

The Monomono Bar is located in the alley of Anhe Road. In the Bargian Bar first -class theater in the East District to Xinyi District, it has been operated for more than 20 years. During the epidemic period, there was a brief rest for a while. Over the years, I have trained many old guests who are very affectionate here, and have received 4.7 stars in Google Reviews.

Monomono mainly provides all kinds of sorting, as well as tabletables in the taste and exotic food. Today I ordered mushroom shrimp balls and fries. Both dishes are quite delicious. The crispy inside also eats the sweetness and dense potato puree, the cooking is impressive!IntersectionBleak

The wine was only ordered to decide the skill of the bartender 😆

The bar is open until three o'clock in the morning, the later the more people are.
Come over at ten o'clock in the evening and chat with friends. The atmosphere is relaxed. The leather sofa and the original wooden table and chair bar are very textured. They are also very comfortable to sit up.

#Taipei Food#Taipei Pickup Scenic Spot#Taipei.com Meibu#Taipei Featured Restaurant####Creative cuisine#Taipei Featured Restaurant#Taipei Special Wine# Featured Bar#特 特 特#特 特 特 特 特#特 网 网 网 特 特

Original:
很老牌的餐酒館，調酒好喝，東西超好吃，招牌的海膽麵非常驚艷，必點！義大利麵的熟度跟硬度剛剛好，不會煮到很軟爛，搭配的醬汁也是一絕。XO醬炒飯也是必點，炒飯粒粒分明、鍋氣十足，另外蛤蠣麵和炒菇也是都超好吃！

薯條的部分給了起司醬沾非常棒，店內還有很多其他的選項，熱炒店的菜也有，可以感覺到廚師非常厲害！

調酒師也都很親切，非常會招待客人，店內整體氣氛很佳。晚上10點後會開放室內可吸菸，我個人和朋友是都有抽菸，這樣很方便。會介意煙味的人要自己斟酌一下。
EN:
Very old -fashioned dining tavern, drinking and delicious, delicious, and delicious, the signature sea urchin surface is very amazing, must be ordered!The maturity and hardness of the Italian noodles are just right, and it will not be cooked very softly, and the sauce is also a must.XO sauce fried rice is also necessary. The rice fried rice is clear and full of gas. In addition, oyster noodles and mushrooms are also super delicious!

The part of the fries is very good for the cheese sauce. There are many other options in the store. There are also foods in hot stir -fried shops. You can feel that the chef is very powerful!

The bartender is also very kind and entertains guests very much. The overall atmosphere in the store is very good.After 10 o'clock in the evening, I will open the room to smoke. I have smoking both personal and friends, which is very convenient.People who mind the smell of smoke must consider themselves.

Original:
Mono mono是一間很酷的酒吧，因為這間酒吧喝玩還可以搭捷運回家，甚麼意思呢？意思就是雖然Google上寫營業時間只到凌晨3點，不過調酒師說其實贏到到早上6點喔，如果早上6點還在這，代表你真的也是酒鬼上身啦！而我又問了調酒師：「怎麼當初你老闆會開這間店？」他回答到：「因為老闆找太久都找不到有讓他可以喝到早上的酒吧，所以就自己開一間。」這其實蠻有趣好玩的！因為自己有這個需求，可能朋友也有這個需求，所以就依這個需求做下去，這是大家很久以前創業的精神，不是為了錢，不是為了改變世界，純粹因為有這個需求就做，而往往這樣發展下去的產品，都能活得長久甚至變很大的公司，像是Microsoft, Apple, Amazon, Facebook，創辦的開始都只是為了滿足自我和朋友之間的需求，如今這4間公司已經成為世界不可或缺的公司，任一間的關門倒閉，都會造成全球經濟上和生活上很大的巨變，所以到底創業是什麼？怎麼樣創業才是最好的？而為什麼這麼多人卻是硬幹的創業？他們又該如何說服他們的顧客買單呢？這是個滿有趣可以更深下去探討的東西。

歡迎追蹤IG: @alcoholneal 來認識更多酒吧
EN:
Mono Mono is a cool bar, because you can take the MRT home when you drink and play in this bar. What do you mean?This means that although the business hours on Google are only 3 am in the morning, the bartender said that it will actually win until 6 am. If you are still here at 6 am, it means that you are really the alcoholic upper body!And I asked the bartender again: "Why did your boss open this shop at the beginning?" He replied: "Because the boss couldn't find it for too long, I couldn't find a bar that allowed him to drink in the morning, so just open one by himself "Between." This is actually very interesting and fun!Because I have this demand, my friends may have this demand, so I do it according to this demand. This is the spirit of everyone's entrepreneurial business a long time ago. It is not for money, not to change the world. The products that go on can live for a long time or even become very large, such as Microsoft, Apple, Amazon, Facebook. The beginning of the founding is only to meet the needs between themselves and friends. Now these 4 companies have become the world. The lacking company, any closure of the closure, will cause great changes in global economy and life, so what is entrepreneurial?How to start a business is the best?And why are so many people who are hard -working?How can they persuade their customers to pay?This is something full of interesting and deeper.

Welcome to track: @alcoholneal to get to know more bars
